settings.text:
With nearly two decades of experience at the top of the classical record market, we have acquired market-leading expertise and a deep and loyal client base. We have set world record prices for individual LPs, conductors, and record labels, and have handled some of the rarest and most sought-after issues ever produced. This means that you can be assured that we will take good care of your collection and provide a fair, accurate, and competitive valuation.

Collections can be purchased either in their entirety or on a record-by-record basis for LPs from the top end of the market. We offer a full end-to-end service for estate clearances, which means we do not cherry-pick; we will take everything if you wish us to, providing an easy and hassle-free experience.

We can view and purchase collections anywhere in the world, including China and Japan, and organise all the logistics required.

Please contact info@33tlr.com for more information.
